name: Wheelbase (TernaryGames)
description:
Created for the Weekly Jam #205!
- DOWNHILL -

Shred carefully as you race down this downhill slope. Perform tricks using WASD or the arrow keys, and build up your score with big combos.

Jump over obstacles and land your tricks to build the biggest high score you can!

Art and Lead Programmer: Jenni Zimmerle.
Programmer, sound design, and particles: Avery Cox.
SFX sourced from: freesound.org.
Music: "Rebel Schism" and "Pancake Department" by Melvin Dovinté.
